mapper.select: select * from articles, carping_sites where articles.article_num = carping_sites.article_num order by articles.article_num desc
select m.mb_profile_pic, a.*, c.* from articles a, carping_sites c, members m where a.article_num=c.article_num and a.mb_id=m.mb_id and a.mb_id='mb_id 01' order by a.article_num desc
select m.mb_profile_pic, a.*, c.* from articles a, carping_sites c, members m where a.article_num=c.article_num and a.mb_id=m.mb_id and a.mb_id='mb_id 02' order by a.article_num desc
